PUP.TotalAV.desc:
PUP.TotalAV is a fake antivirus program which is normally downloaded and installed as an independant file (not a bundle).
This program will ask for personal data and request payment.
This program can be removed by the Unwanted Program Removal tool, or by Malwarebytes's ADWCleaner (https://malwarebytes.com/adwcleaner)
